messages.content: On 8 June, families in Edinburgh West can choose between a Labour government that stands up for the many, or the Tories who only look after a privileged few. While they give the super-rich tax breaks, working families are worse off. The SNP has simply passed on Tory austerity while it focuses on plans for a divisive second independence referendum that Scotland doesn't want. I believe that together we’re stronger and I will oppose a second referendum. A vote for Labour on 8 June is a vote for a country run for the many, not the few.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nicola Sturgeon should get back to the day job. I'll oppose a divisive second independence referendum.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Lift the national minimum wage to £10 an hour
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Edinburgh West and Britain deserves a pay rise. Labour's real living wage will deliver it.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect tax credits for working families in Edinburgh West
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'll fight to ensure more money goes to our nurses, working families, and business.
A hard Brexit will be bad for Scotland and Britain. I'll oppose it and seek a better deal.

issues.brexitEurope: Fight a hard Brexit. A hard Brexit will be bad for Scotland and Britain. I'll oppose it and seek a better deal.
issues.labourEmployment: Edinburgh West and Britain deserves a pay rise. Labour's real living wage will deliver it.
issues.socialWelfare: I'll fight to ensure more money goes to our nurses, working families, and business.

community.content: The SNP has simply passed on Tory austerity while it focuses on plans for a divisive second independence referendum that Scotland doesn't want. I believe that together we’re stronger and I will oppose a second referendum.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will always put Edinburgh West first. We need a local champion who will oppose a second independence referendum and work for the many, not the few.

endorsements.endorser: Local Drumbrake community activist Kenny Wright
endorsements.endorsement: I'm backing Mandy as a strong local voice for Edinburgh West. The Tories and the SNP are holding families back. Only Labour will build a Britain for the many, not the few, and oppose a second independence referendum.

quotes.text: Only a Labour Government can unleash the great potential of this country.
